query.sql: WITH replic_var as ( select c.status_id, replic.card_id, replic.string_value from attribute_value replic inner join card c on c.card_id = replic.card_id where c.template_id = 2400 and c.status_id in (10001051, 10001052, 10001056) and replic.attribute_code = 'REPLIC_GUID' ), refs_var as ( Select distinct av.card_id as av_id, rv.card_id as rv_id from attribute_value av inner join replic_var rv on rv.string_value = av.string_value Where av.template_id in (10, 222, 484, 780, 1206, 2300) and av.attribute_code = 'REPLICATION_UUID' and rv.string_value is not null and av.string_value is not null ), replic_owner_refs_var as ( select rep_owner.string_value, rep_owner.card_id from attribute_value rep_owner where attribute_code = 'REPLICATION_OWNER' and rep_owner.card_id in (select av_id from refs_var) ), replic_owner_replics_var as ( select rep_owner.string_value, rep_owner.card_id from attribute_value rep_owner where attribute_code = 'REPLICATION_OWNER' and rep_owner.card_id in (select rv_id from refs_var) ) select rfv.rv_id, rorv.string_value, rorpv.string_value from refs_var rfv left join replic_owner_refs_var rorv on rorv.card_id = rfv.av_id left join replic_owner_replics_var rorpv on rorpv.card_id = rfv.rv_id where rorv.string_value = rorpv.string_value
